ygData.subject: Re: Banded armor and looks
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s not so bad, IMO, but I did recently acquire a bronze plate helm for 20PP for my barbarian warrior, Dalkin.  The large horn appearance of the plate
ygData.messageBody:
Patricia Halas wrote:
>
> From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
>
> Phooey, ok banded armor is lighter and stronger than ringmail, but it still
> looks yucky.

It's not so bad, IMO, but I did recently acquire a bronze plate helm
for 20PP for my barbarian warrior, Dalkin. The large horn appearance of
the plate helm is WAY better than that of the banded/ring coif.

> What do I need to get next? Where is this rubicte stuff?

Some guildmates are going for the all-black look of Blackened(sp?)
armor, found on elite gnolls and the warlord in Runnyeye. Is the same
or close AC to banded, but weighs more.

Rubicite is magical plate, wearable by more classes than typical
plate. Where, dunno. Who? I've heard levels 30+ in groups to
tackle the monsters in question.

-Dalkin Orcslayer
Solusek Ro
